lyrics.text: Lesson 71. He's awful. Listen to the tape, then answer this question. How did Pauline
lyrics.translation: 第71课。他太可怕了。听录音，然后回答这个问题。波琳是如何

lyrics.text: What's Ron Mastering like Pauline? He's awful. He telephoned me four times yesterday and
lyrics.translation: 罗恩模仿波琳是什么样子的？他太可怕了。他昨天给我打了四次电话，

lyrics.text: three times the day before yesterday. He telephoned the office yesterday morning and yesterday
lyrics.translation: 三天前。他昨天早上给办公室打了电话，昨天

lyrics.text: afternoon. My boss answered the telephone. What did your boss say to him? He said, Pauline
lyrics.translation: 下午。我的老板接了电话。你的老板对他说了什么？他说，波琳

lyrics.text: is typing letters. She can't speak to you now. Then I arrived home at 6 o'clock yesterday
lyrics.translation: 正在打字。她现在不能和你说话。然后我昨天6点钟到家

lyrics.text: evening. He telephoned again, but I didn't answer the phone. Did he telephone again last
lyrics.translation: 晚上。他又打来电话，但我没有接电话。他昨晚又打电话了吗？

lyrics.text: night? Yes, he did. He telephoned at 9 o'clock. What did you say to him? I said, This is Pauline's
lyrics.translation: 晚上？是的，他打了。他在九点钟打电话。你对他说什么了？我说，这是波琳的

lyrics.text: mother. Please don't telephone my daughter again. Did he telephone again? No, he didn't.
lyrics.translation: 母亲。请不要再给我女儿打电话了。他有再打电话吗？不，他没有。
